{{For|the 2010 Israeli Navy operation|Gaza flotilla raid}} {{Warbox |conflict=Operation Sea Breeze |partof=[[Sri Lankan Civil War]] |campaign= |image= |caption= |date=September 1990 |place=[[Mullaitivu]], northern [[Sri Lanka]] |result=Sri Lankan Military victory |territory= |combatant1={{flagicon|SRI|size=25px}} [[Sri Lankan Military]] |combatant2=[[LTTE]] |commander1=[[Major General]] (later Lieutenant General) [[Denzil Kobbekaduwa]],
[[Brigadier]] (later Major General) [[Vijaya Wimalaratne]] |commander2=[[Velupillai Prabhakaran]] |strength1= |strength2= |casualties1= |casualties2= |notes= }} '''Operation Sea Breeze''' was a combined military operation launched by the [[Sri Lanka Armed Forces]] in [[Mullaitivu]]. It was the first [[amphibious operation]] launched by the Sri Lankan military in its history. The operation was carried out to break the siege and reinforce the [[Sri Lanka Army]] camp in Mullaitivu. It was successfully carried out and the area controlled by the camp was extended.[http://www.lankalibrary.com/phpBB/viewtopic.php?t=2399 Eelam War II - "Operation Balavegaya" ] ==References== {{reflist}} [[Category:Eelam War II]] [[Category:Military campaigns involving Sri Lanka]] [[Category:Military history of Sri Lanka]] [[Category:Tamil Eelam]] [[Category:1990 in Asia]]
